# Introdution

First let's simulate some data.

```{r echo=TRUE}
n <- 50
x <- seq(1, n)
a.true <- 3
b.true <- 1.5
y.true <- a.true + b.true * x
s.true <- 17.3
y <- y.true + s.true * rnorm(n)
```

Before we estimate the linear expression $y_t = x_t^{\top} \beta + \varepsilon_t$ using the `lm` command in R.

```{r echo=FALSE}
out1 <- lm(y ~ x)
summary(out1)
```

A figure is then produced by the following code:

```{r echo=FALSE}
plot(x, y)
abline(out1)
```
